item.title: 梅丽莎-贝努伊斯特（Melissa Benoist）说，由于她的 MAX 新剧《巴士上的女孩》（Girls on the Bus），她对记者有了新的尊重。该剧讲述了一个记者团中的女记者与总统候选人在竞选路上同行的故事。
item.description:
Melissa Benoist says she has new respect for journalists thanks to her new MAX series "Girls on the Bus." The show follows female journalists in a press corps traveling with presidential candidates on the campaign trail. pic.twitter.com/ml1zE9vwob

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 12, 2024
